As Pueblo leaders tell us, Chaco holds the footprints of our  ancestors. Countless generations have carried forward their teachings  and traditions. As Navajo leaders have said, it is a landscape deeply  embedded in our way of life and which protects the living community,  youth, elders, and our culture.
